TopicTitle: Share Your Kraken Attacks In KSP 2!

Articles.Content:
Since I've experienced some kraken attacks while playing Kerbal Space Program 2, I thought it would be interesting to start a thread and see what other kinds of krakens players are getting attacked by. I'll start this with a video I created showing what happened when I was trying to do a Mun mission in KSP 2 early access.

Share your kraken attacks underneath this! I would like it if you can post screenshots or videos showing what happened as well.
I laughed to tears when, after saving, I really loaded into some kind of monster with tentacles.
